# /preview - Shopify Theme Development Server

Start the theme dev server with live preview.

## Command

```bash
shopify theme dev --store=YOUR_STORE.myshopify.com
```

## Notes

- Hot reload enabled for all file types
- Opens browser automatically
- Syncs changes to development theme
- Use `--theme-editor-sync` to sync customizer changes back
